alert.note: Alert for Champaign; Christian; De Witt; Douglas; Macon; McLean; Morgan; Moultrie; Piatt; Sangamon; Shelby; Vermilion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 10:02PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A gust front will impact portions of central Christian, central Sangamon, Moultrie, northwestern Shelby, Piatt, southeastern De Witt, Vermilion, southeastern McLean, Champaign, western Douglas, Macon and southeastern Morgan Counties through 1045 PM CDT... At 1001 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a gust front along a line extending from 6 miles northwest of Rantoul to near Argenta to Niantic to near Riverton. Movement was southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong winds will be near... Argenta around 1005 PM CDT. Rantoul, Monticello, Cerro Gordo and Thomasboro around 1010 PM CDT. Bement, Macon, Gifford and Mechanicsburg around 1015 PM CDT. Mount Zion, Moweaqua, Edinburg and Hammond around 1020 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Kincaid, Dalton City, Mount Auburn, Bulpitt, Jeisyville, Taylorville, Arthur, Atwood, Ogden, Bethany, Stonington, Fithian, Muncie, Tuscola, Oakwood and Fairmount. This includes the following highways... Interstate 55 between mile markers 77 and 100. Interstate 57 between mile markers 206 and 257. Interstate 72 between mile markers 90 and 182. Interstate 74 between mile markers 164 and 214. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CDT for central and west central Illinois. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch also remains in effect until midnight CDT for central Illinois.

area.areaDesc: Champaign; Christian; De Witt; Douglas; Macon; McLean; Morgan; Moultrie; Piatt; Sangamon; Shelby; Vermilion
